mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rochemont, Quinette de
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sends by Mr. Holly two brochures which he is to consider the continuation of articles; one is treatise on elections; one about liberty of the press; both mark the progress, wisdom and fortitude of French public opinion; in recent election liberals got majority; discusses French politics; if Belgium and France do not offer him hospitality he will bring his family to U.S.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1818 February 11, New York , [New York] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
